events.message: I am filing a claim after my car was involved in a collision with another vehicle at an intersection last night.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle damage and collision details.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim and will reach out to you shortly.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and have started the initial review process for your vehicle damages.
Please submit photos of your damaged car, the police collision report, and any medical bills if applicable to proceed.
The requested documents, including photos of the vehicle damage and the official police report, have been submitted.
Our investigators have started looking into the circumstances of the car accident to verify all details and liability.
The investigation related to your auto collision has been completed and all information has been verified.
We have prepared a settlement offer covering the repair costs and related expenses for your vehicle after the accident.
The customer has provided feedback requesting clarification about the settlement figures and coverage details.
Your auto accident claim has been approved and payment will be processed shortly in accordance with the agreed settlement.
The settlement payment has been issued to your account to cover the damages to your vehicle as approved in your claim.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed after all payments and procedures were completed satisfactorily.
The claim documents and related information have been archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
